ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_angles_distances_volumes.compute_bond_angle(position1: numpy.ndarray, position2: numpy.ndarray, position3: numpy.ndarray) → float¶

Compute bond angle of a three body bond

Parameters:
  • position1 – position of the first atom
  • position2 – position of the second atom
  • position3 – position of the third atom
Returns:

the bond angle

  • is_radian – whether the angle in box is radian or not

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_errors module¶

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_errors.compute_error_reaxff(calculated_values: dict, training_datas: dict, settings: dict, output_directory: str = None) → Union[float, ff_optimum.cores.compute_builtin.multiobjectives.Fitness]¶

Compute the error between LAMMPS calculated values and DFT training datas

Parameters:
  • calculated_values – values calculated by LAMMPS
  • training_datas – DFT training data
  • settings – optimization settings
Returns:

  • weighted_sum_error – if it is scalarized objective function
  • Fitness object – Otherwise

See also

__compute_error_reaxff_inner()

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_values module¶

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_values.compute_values_lammps(lammps_commands_dict: dict, parameters: dict, temp_directory: str) → dict¶

Compute values of multi-frame of input lammps_commands by LAMMPS

If the Singleton Client of ipyparallel is ready the value will be calulated parallely otherwise, it will be calculated serially.

Parameters:
  • lammps_commands_dict – dictionary of list containing the LAMMPS commands according to the molecule name
  • parameters – ReaxFF parameters
Returns:

dictionary of list containing the calculated value according to the molecule name
Return type:

calculated_values

See also

reaxff.compute.compute_values.__compute_values_lammps_multi_frame_parallel(), reaxff.compute.compute_values.__compute_values_lammps_multi_frame_serial(), reaxff.io.write_force_field.save_force_field_to_file(), utilities.parallel.ipyparallel_singleton.is_client_ready()

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_values(lammps_commands_dict: dict, parameters: dict, temp_directory: str) → dict¶

Compute values of multi-frame of input lammps_commands by LAMMPS

If the Singleton Client of ipyparallel is ready the value will be calulated parallely otherwise, it will be calculated serially.

Parameters:
  • lammps_commands_dict – dictionary of list containing the LAMMPS commands according to the molecule name
  • parameters – ReaxFF parameters
Returns:

dictionary of list containing the calculated value according to the molecule name
Return type:

calculated_values

ff_optimum.user_packages.reaxff.compute.compute_errors(calculated_values: dict, training_datas: dict, settings: dict, output_directory: str = None) → Union[float, ff_optimum.cores.compute_builtin.multiobjectives.Fitness]¶

Compute the error between LAMMPS calculated values and DFT training datas

Parameters:
  • calculated_values – values calculated by LAMMPS
  • training_datas – DFT training data
  • settings – optimization settings
Returns:

  • weighted_sum_error – if it is scalarized objective function
  • Fitness object – Otherwise

See also
